August 30, 2013, Teresa was a client of Bretta’s

I had the privilege of working with Bretta and Team BevCom to plan three statewide charter school conferences in Texas. Bretta was most effective at raising money, strategizing savings, and maintaining strong vendor relationships that allowed us to attract previous vendors and expand the exhibit hall each year.  Conference attendees increased every year with growing satisfaction. Bretta excels at humility...she is an excellent team player and manages difficult personalities very well.  That's quality!
